name: Gridmaster
description:
Step into the world of Gridmaster, a high-speed single-player racer. Take on time trials, master the art of drifting, and compete on the leaderboards. As you dominate the road, unlock new cars and tracks to fuel your journey to victory!

Time Trials

Push your racing skills to the limit in Gridmaster's Time Trials. Compete to achieve precision and speed on every twist and turn of the track as you aim to set new records. It's a challenge against the relentless pursuit of perfection, where every split-second decision counts. Get ready to prove your mettle and strive for victory as you aim to reach your personal best!

Drift Mode

Unleash your inner drift master in Gridmaster's thrilling Drift mode. Slide your car with finesse around every corner, achieving the perfect balance of control and chaos. Rack up impressive drift points as you embrace the art of controlled skidding. It's a symphony of tire smoke and screeching wheels, where style and precision merge. Get ready to burn rubber and leave your mark as the ultimate Drift Champion!

Diverse Tracks, Stunning Landscapes

In Gridmaster, you'll race through a range of tracks, each surrounded by captivating and unique landscapes. From classic circuits to snowy paths, lush forests, Mediterranean islands, and arid deserts, each track offers a visual feast. Get ready to embark on a journey through Gridmaster's mesmerizing sceneries!

Features

  • Mouse Steering
  • Drift Camera Mode
  • 12 Cars
  • 9 Tracks
  • 51 Challenges
  • Gamepad Support

A Game made by one Gamer
